mapper.select:
select vi.id, vi.code, vi.name, vi.start_date, vi.end_date, vi.enterprise_id, vi.address, vi.longitude, vi.latitude, vi.remark, vi.create_date, ei.name as enterpriseName, ei.abbreviation, ei.nature, ed.logo from venue_info vi left join enterprise_info ei on (ei.id = vi.enterprise_id) left join enterprise_detail ed on (ed.enterprise_id = ei.id) where 1 = 1
AND vi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{venueInfo.code},'%')
AND vi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{venueInfo.name},'%')
AND ei.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{venueInfo.enterpriseName},'%')
AND ei.abbreviation LIKE CONCAT('%',#{venueInfo.abbreviation},'%')
AND ei.user_id = #{venueInfo.enterpriseId}
order by vi.create_date desc
